text: Can I create a workflow that triggers based on a specific UTM parameter value?

Actually, I'd like to automate a workflow for PPC leads. I need to get campagin names by utm campaign and assign contacts based on their campaign names, so I need help setting that up. Could you guide me on how to do this?
These are my workflow i have tried, but the criteria is met, but i got confusion on action setup, could any help me to do this!

Hi!
1. Does anyone know if it’s possible to auto-delete records through API calls? 
2. Does anyone know if it’s possible to auto-delete records through <https://www.HubSpot.com/products/operations/programmable-automation|programmable automation>?

Hi Elin - I don't have experience on #2 but I am curious about what you're thinking for #1. There are /delete calls available in the HubSpot API, so it's more of a matter of settings the conditions for deleting them unless there are nuanced requirements on what your end goal is.

I am willing to bet that the utm_campaign is stripped from the URL parameter, so you would need a way to enumerate that value into the actual value that goes into PPC Campaign Name (which I assume is just the name, not the url parameter value).

Hello!
I am new(ish) to HubSpot and looking to use Line Items in a workflow.  It doesn't seem like there is any native, no code way to do it, but I'm curious if you more experienced folks have a way?

 My solution has been to use <http://Make.com|Make.com> to build a no code workflow that my customer could maintain long term.
